name: Keto Pecan-Crusted Pork Chops in the Air Fryer
author: Bibi
summary: This keto-friendly recipe comes together in a snap! In addition, using the air fryer makes easy work of these tasty pork chops. The chops make great leftovers too, because the pecan crust doesn't get soggy!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 ½ cups finely chopped raw pecans
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 390 degrees F (200 degrees C), about 5 minutes, if directed by the manufacturer
Combine cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, salt, and pepper in a small bowl
Add egg and whisk until all ingredients are well combined
Dip each pork chop into the egg mixture, then set on the plate with the pecans, pressing pecans firmly onto both sides until coated
Spray the chops on both sides with cooking spray and place in the air fryer basket
Cook in the air fryer for 6 minutes
Turn chops carefully with tongs, and air fry until pork is no longer pink in the center, about 6 minutes longer
Serve warm, garnished with fresh parsley
